transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: This is Marcus from Allied Recovery. You have a debt of $3,200 that's seriously past due. We need payment TODAY.

transcript.speaker: client
transcript.text: I can't pay that all at once!

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Well you should have thought about that before you decided not to pay your bills. If we don't get at least $1,000 by Friday, we're moving forward with legal action.

transcript.speaker: client
transcript.text: That's not fair, I've been trying to work with you!

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Look, I don't make the rules. This is your last chance. Can you pay $1,000 or not?

transcript.speaker: client
transcript.text: I... I can try to get $500.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Fine, but that doesn't stop the legal process. Get us $500 by Friday and we'll see what we can do.
